yeah i’ve heard that before, but the command opens for the owners? even with a rights = 0 thingy, or doesnt that matter?

Why don’t you debug yourself? Go through the regular debugging process. And I don’t know your code.

item.title: ::vote command wont connect to website for all
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

The launchURL() in most PI clients were done before the Desktop method of opening a browser were invented I think. It doesn’t work 100%.

    private static void launchURL(String url) {
        Desktop d = Desktop.getDesktop();
        try {
            d.browse(new URI(url));
        } catch (Exception e) {
			System.out.println("An error has occured while opening a website!");
        }
    }

You should replace startsWith with equals or equalsIgnoreCase too.

Read full topic

item.title: ::vote command wont connect to website for all
item.dc:creator: @cdaveeez cdaveeez
item.description:
@cdaveeez wrote:

hey, so i have completed the auto vote mysql thingy, and added a command.

but it only lets certain people use the ::vote command. By that i mean, it only opens the website for some. at first it only opened for those with firefox(and it opened for firefox with me), but it doesnt open for everyone?

here's my vote command: if(playerCommand.startsWith("vote")) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("www.serenox.site90.net/vote.php", 12000); }

?

Read full topic
